title: unnait-teLindiDuvAi
sahitya:
unnait-teLindiDuvAi uLamE


anupallavi

  unnai shiva sattenrE uLLapaDi arindAl innalillai enrum inbam inbam inbamE


caraNam    cintai alaiyAmal dhyAnattil kUTTuvAi dinam dinam manattirkku shiva bhakti UTTuvAi
vandadum pOnadum varundi ninaiyAdE vAghAyirundapaDi sOham bhAvanai sheidAl
